boardgame.description: A cooperative dungeon crawl game in which a party of four heroes strives to complete adventures that the Dungeon Master puts before them. Quite similar to HeroQuest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Eternal Winter Expansion Pack(2003)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Forbidden Forest Expansion Pack(2004)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

first german edition +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-currency countries in europe : paypal, cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no cheques ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), please ask for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

**** ON HOLD DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU ARE ghettojeppetto **** Very nice copy of this out of print classic which looks like new and unplayed and is mostly still unpunched (some things fell out of sprues and were bagged). Everything is bagged still incl minis, cards etc though I am unsure if bags are original (hard to tell I am not original owner) so its possible the game was played once and some things rebagged. Verified 100% complete and all components are in excellent unplayed condition, the only flaw I noticed was very light mottling on one board due to how things are stored inside the box by design. Also note that four of the 100 blood tokens are proxy replacements (very close to original) Box is in good shape for its age and very solid with light wear, some mottling and a crease on the back. Can send pictures if wanted. Will be packed VERY carefully before shipping (see my feedback) feel free to ask questions or for a shipping quote. Shipping will be actual cost quoted by Post Office only nothing more and the method of your choice.
